text: 3000 (three thousand) is the natural number following 2999 and preceding 3001. It is also an even composite number, and it has only has one significant number (3). ==Roman Numerals== 3000 in Roman Numerals is written as MMM. ==Factors of 3000== The factors of 3000 are: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 15, 20, 24, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 75, 100, 120, 125, 150, 200, 250, 300, 375, 500, 600, 750, 1000, 1500 and 3000. ==Examples== *three kilograms = 3000 grams *three kilometres = 3000 metres *three litres = 3000 millilitres ==References== Category:Integers
title: 3000 (number)
